MOVEMENT, POSITION, AND DISTANCE

Miniatures are on the 30mm scale—a miniature figure of a six-foot-tall human is approximately 30mm tall. A square on the battle grid is 1 inch across, representing a 5-foot-by-5-foot 범위.

전략적 이동

Encumbrance: A character encumbered by carrying a large amount of gear, 전리품, or fallen comrades may 이동 slower than normal.

Hampered 이동: Difficult terrain, obstacles, or poor visibility can hamper 이동.

이동 in 전투: Generally, you can 이동 your 속도 in a round and still do something (take a 이동 action and a standard action).

If you do nothing but 이동(that is, if you use both of your actions in a round to 이동 your 속도), you can 이동 double your 속도.

If you spend the entire round running, you can 이동 quadruple your 속도. If you do something that requires a full round you can only take a 5-foot step.

보너스 to 속도: 바바리안 has a +10 foot 보너스 to his 속도(unless he의 wearing heavy 갑옷). Experienced 수도사 also have higher 속도(unless they’re wearing 갑옷 of any sort). In addition, many 주문 and 마법 아이템 can affect a character의 속도. Always apply any 수정치 to a character의 속도 before adjusting the character의 속도 based on 갑옷 or encumbrance, and remember that multiple 보너스 of the same type to a character의 속도 don’t stack.

거리 측정
Measuring Distance

Diagonals: When 거리 측정, the first diagonal counts as 1 square, the second counts as 2 squares, the third counts as 1, the fourth as 2, and so on.

You can’t 이동 diagonally past a corner (even by taking a 5-foot step). You can 이동 diagonally past a creature, even an opponent.

You can also 이동 diagonally past other impassable obstacles, such as pits.

Moving through a Square

Friend: You can 이동 through a square occupied by a friendly character, unless you are charging. When you 이동 through a square occupied by a friendly character, that character doesn’t provide you with 엄폐.

Opponent: You can’t 이동 through a square occupied by an opponent, unless the opponent is helpless. You can 이동 through a square occupied by a helpless opponent without 페널티. (Some creatures, particularly very large ones, may present an obstacle even when helpless. In such cases, each square you 이동 through counts as 2 squares.)

Ending Your 이동: You can’t end your 이동 in the same square as another creature unless it is helpless.

A big creature can 이동 through a square occupied by a creature three size categories smaller than it is.

지형과 장애물
Terrain and Obstacles

Difficult Terrain: Difficult terrain hampers 이동. Each square of difficult terrain counts as 2 squares of 이동. (Each diagonal 이동 into a difficult terrain square counts as 3 squares.) You can’t 달리기 or 돌격 across difficult terrain.

If you occupy squares with different kinds of terrain, you can 이동 only as fast as the most difficult terrain you occupy will allow.

Flying and incorporeal creatures are not hampered by difficult terrain.

Obstacles: Like difficult terrain, obstacles can hamper 이동. If an obstacle hampers 이동 but doesn’t completely block it each obstructed square or obstacle between squares counts as 2 squares of 이동. You must pay this cost to cross the barrier, in addition to the cost to 이동 into the square on the other side. If you don’t have sufficient 이동 to cross the barrier and 이동 into the square on the other side, you can’t cross the barrier. Some obstacles may also require a skill check to cross.

On the other hand, some obstacles block 이동 entirely. A character can’t 이동 through a blocking obstacle.

Flying and incorporeal creatures can avoid most obstacles

Squeezing: In some cases, you may have to squeeze into or through an 범위 that isn’t as wide as the space you take up. You can squeeze through or into a space that is at least half as wide as your normal space. Each 이동 into or through a narrow space counts as if it were 2 squares, and while squeezed in a narrow space you take a –4 페널티 on 명중 굴림 and a –4 페널티 to AC.

When a Large creature (which normally takes up four squares) squeezes into a space that의 one square wide, the creature의 miniature figure occupies two squares, centered on the line between the two squares. For a bigger creature, center the creature likewise in 범위 it squeezes into.

A creature can squeeze past an opponent while moving but it can’t end its 이동 in an occupied square.

To squeeze through or into a space less than half your space의 width, you must use 탈출 전문가 skill. You can’t 공격 while using 탈출 전문가 to squeeze through or into a narrow space, you take a –4 페널티 to AC, and you lose any 민첩 보너스 to AC.

특수 이동 규칙
Special Movement Rules

These rules 엄폐 special 이동 situations.

Accidentally Ending 이동 in an Illegal Space: Sometimes a character ends its 이동 while moving through a space where it의 not allowed to stop. When that happens, put your miniature in the last legal position you occupied, or the closest legal position, if there의 a legal position that의 closer.

Double 이동 비용: When your 이동 is hampered in some way, your 이동 usually costs double. For example, each square of 이동 through difficult terrain counts as 2 squares, and each diagonal 이동 through such terrain counts as 3 squares (just as two diagonal 이동 normally do).

If 이동 cost is doubled twice, then each square counts as 4 squares (or as 6 squares if moving diagonally). If 이동 cost is doubled three times, then each square counts as 8 squares (12 if diagonal) and so on. This is an exception to the general rule that two doublings are equivalent to a tripling.

Minimum 이동: Despite 페널티 to 이동, you can take a full-round action to 이동 5 feet (1 square) in any direction, even diagonally. (This rule doesn’t allow you to 이동 through impassable terrain or to 이동 when all 이동 is prohibited.) Such 이동 provokes 기회 공격 as normal (despite the distance covered, this 이동 isn’t a 5-foot step).

크거나 작은 생명체의 전투

BIG AND LITTLE CREATURES IN COMBAT

Creatures smaller than Small or larger than Medium have special rules relating to position.

Tiny, Diminutive, and Fine Creatures: Very small creatures take up less than 1 square of space. This means that more than one such creature can fit into a single square. A Tiny creature typically occupies a space only 2-1/2 feet across, so four can fit into a single square. Twenty-five Diminutive creatures or 100 Fine creatures can fit into a single square. Creatures that take up less than 1 square of space typically have a natural reach of 0 feet, meaning they can’t reach into adjacent squares. They must enter an opponent의 square to 공격 in melee. This provokes an 공격 of opportunity from the opponent. You can 공격 into your own square if you need to, so you can 공격 such creatures normally. Since they have no natural reach, they do not threaten the squares around them. You can 이동 past them without provoking 기회 공격. They also can’t flank an enemy.

Large, Huge, Gargantuan, and Colossal Creatures: Very large creatures take up more than 1 square.

Creatures that take up more than 1 square typically have a natural reach of 10 feet or more, meaning that they can reach targets even if they aren’t in adjacent squares.

Unlike when someone uses a 긴 무기, a creature with 상급 than normal natural reach (more than 5 feet) still threatens squares adjacent to it. A creature with 상급 than normal natural reach usually gets an 공격 of opportunity against you if you approach it, because you must enter and 이동 within 거리 of its reach before you can 공격 it. (This 공격 of opportunity is not provoked if you take a 5-foot step.)

Large or larger creatures using 긴 무기 can strike up to double their natural reach but can’t strike at their natural reach or less.

엄폐

COVER

To determine whether your target has 엄폐 from your ranged 공격, choose a corner of your square. If any line from this corner to any corner of the target의 square passes through a square or border that blocks line of effect or provides 엄폐, or through a square occupied by a creature, the target has 엄폐(+4 to AC).

When making a melee 공격 against an adjacent target, your target has 엄폐 if any line from your square to the target의 square goes through a wall (including a low wall). When making a melee 공격 against a target that isn’t adjacent to you (such as with a 긴 무기), use the rules for determining 엄폐 from ranged 공격.

Low Obstacles and 엄폐: A low obstacle (such as a wall no higher than half your height) provides 엄폐, but only to creatures within 30 feet (6 squares) of it. The attacker can ignore 엄폐 if he의 closer to the obstacle than his target.

엄폐 and 기회 공격: You can’t execute an 공격 of opportunity against an opponent with 엄폐 relative to you.

엄폐 and Reflex 내성 굴림: 엄폐 grants you a +2 보너스 on Reflex 내성 굴림 against 공격 that originate or 폭발 out from a point on the other side of 엄폐 from you. Note that spread effects can extend around corners and thus negate this 엄폐 보너스.

엄폐 and 숨기 Checks: You can use 엄폐 to make a 숨기 check. Without 엄폐, you usually need 은폐(see below) to make a 숨기 check.

Soft 엄폐: Creatures, even your enemies, can provide you with 엄폐 against ranged 공격, giving you a +4 보너스 to AC. However, such soft 엄폐 provides no 보너스 on Reflex 내성 굴림, nor does soft 엄폐 allow you to make a 숨기 check.

Big Creatures and 엄폐: Any creature with a space larger than 5 feet (1 square) determines 엄폐 against melee 공격 slightly differently than smaller creatures do. Such a creature can choose any square that it occupies to determine if an opponent has 엄폐 against its melee 공격. Similarly, when making a melee 공격 against such a creature, you can pick any of the squares it occupies to determine if it has 엄폐 against you.

Total 엄폐: If you don’t have line of effect to your target he is considered to have total 엄폐 from you. You can’t make an 공격 against a target that has total 엄폐.

Varying Degrees of 엄폐: In some cases, 엄폐 may provide a 상급 보너스 to AC and Reflex 내성 굴림. In such situations the normal 엄폐 보너스 to AC and Reflex 내성 굴림 can be doubled (to +8 and +4, respectively). 은폐

CONCEALMENT

When making a melee 공격 against an adjacent target, your target has 은폐 if his space is entirely within an effect that grants 은폐. When making a melee 공격 against a target that isn’t adjacent to you use the rules for determining 은폐 from ranged 공격.

In addition, some magical effects provide 은폐 against all 공격, regardless of whether any intervening 은폐 exists.

은폐 Miss Chance: 은폐 gives the subject of a successful 공격 a 20% chance that the attacker missed because of 은폐. If the attacker hits, the defender must make a miss chance percentile roll to avoid being struck. Multiple 은폐 상태이상 do not stack.

은폐 and 숨기 Checks: You can use 은폐 to make a 숨기 check. Without 은폐, you usually need 엄폐 to make a 숨기 check.

Total 은폐: If you have line of effect to a target but not line of sight he is considered to have total 은폐 from you. You can’t 공격 an opponent that has total 은폐, though you can 공격 into a square that you think he occupies. A successful 공격 into a square occupied by an enemy with total 은폐 has a 50% miss chance (instead of the normal 20% miss chance for an opponent with 은폐).

You can’t execute an 공격 of opportunity against an opponent with total 은폐, even if you know what square or squares the opponent occupies.

Ignoring 은폐: 은폐 isn’t always effective. A shadowy 범위 or 암흑 doesn’t provide any 은폐 against an opponent with 암흑시야. Characters with 저광시야 can see clearly for a 상급 distance with the same 빛 source than other characters. Although 투명화 provides total 은폐, sighted opponents may still make 감지 checks to notice the location of an invisible character. An invisible character gains a +20 보너스 on 숨기 checks if moving, or a +40 보너스 on 숨기 checks when not moving (even though opponents can’t see you, they might be able to figure out where you are from other visual clues).

Varying Degrees of 은폐: Certain situations may provide more or less than typical 은폐, and modify the miss chance accordingly.

협공

FLANKING

When making a melee 공격, you get a +2 협공 보너스 if your opponent is threatened by a character or creature friendly to you on the opponent의 opposite border or opposite corner.

When in doubt about whether two friendly characters flank an opponent in the middle, trace an imaginary line between the two friendly characters’ centers. If the line passes through opposite borders of the opponent의 space (including corners of those borders), then the opponent is flanked.

예외: If a flanker takes up more than 1 square, it gets 협공 보너스 if any square it occupies counts for 협공.

Only a creature or character that threatens the defender can help an attacker get a 협공 보너스.

Creatures with a reach of 0 feet can’t flank an opponent.

무력화 상태의 상대방

HELPLESS DEFENDERS

A helpless opponent is someone who is bound, sleeping, paralyzed, unconscious, or otherwise at your mercy.

Regular 공격: A helpless character takes a –4 페널티 to AC against melee 공격, but no 페널티 to AC against ranged 공격.

A helpless defender can’t use any 민첩 보너스 to AC. In fact, his 민첩 score is treated as if it were 0 and his 민첩 수정치 to AC as if it were –5 (and a 도적 can 은밀한 공격 him).

Coup de Grace: As a full-round action, you can use a 근접 무기 to deliver a coup de grace to a helpless opponent. You can also use a bow or crossbow, provided you are adjacent to the target.

You automatically hit and score a critical hit. If the defender survives 피해, he must make a Fortitude save (DC 10 + 피해 dealt) or die. A 도적 also gets her extra 은밀한 공격 피해 against a helpless opponent when delivering a coup de grace.

Delivering a coup de grace provokes 기회 공격 from threatening opponents.

You can’t deliver a coup de grace against a creature that is immune to critical hits. You can deliver a coup de grace against a creature with total 은폐, but doing this requires two consecutive 전체 라운드 행동(one to “find” the creature once you’ve determined what square it의 in, and one to deliver the coup de grace).

보조하기

AID ANOTHER

In melee 전투, you can help a friend 공격 or defend by distracting or interfering with an opponent. Multiple characters can 보조 the same friend, and similar 보너스 stack.

You can also use this standard action to help a friend in other ways, such as when he is affected by a spell, or to assist another character의 skill check.

황소 쇄도

BULL RUSH

You can make a 황소 쇄도 as a standard action (an 공격) or as part of a 돌격(see 돌격, below). When you make a 황소 쇄도, you attempt to push an opponent straight back instead of damaging him. You can only 황소 쇄도 an opponent who is one size category larger than you, the same size, or smaller.

Initiating a 황소 쇄도: First, you 이동 into the defender의 space. Doing this provokes an 공격 of opportunity from each opponent that threatens you, including the defender. (If you have 향상된 황소 쇄도 feat, you don’t provoke an 공격 of opportunity from the defender.) Any 공격 of opportunity made by anyone other than the defender against you during a 황소 쇄도 has a 25% chance of accidentally targeting the defender instead, and any 공격 of opportunity by anyone other than you against the defender likewise has a 25% chance of accidentally targeting you. (When someone makes an 공격 of opportunity, make 명중 굴림 and then roll to see whether 공격 went astray.)

Second, you and the defender make opposed 근력 checks. You each add a +4 보너스 for each size category you are larger than Medium or a –4 페널티 for each size category you are smaller than Medium. You get a +2 보너스 if you are charging. The defender gets a +4 보너스 if he has more than two legs or is otherwise exceptionally stable.

황소 쇄도 Results: If you beat the defender의 근력 check result, you push him back 5 feet. If you 소원 to 이동 with the defender, you can push him back an additional 5 feet for each 5 points by which your check result is 상급 than the defender의 check result. You can’t, however, exceed your normal 이동 limit. (Note: The defender provokes 기회 공격 if he is moved. So do you, if you 이동 with him. The two of you do not provoke 기회 공격 from each other, however.)

If you fail to beat the defender의 근력 check result, you 이동 5 feet straight back to where you were before you moved into his space. If that space is occupied, you fall prone in that space.

돌격

CHARGE

Charging is a special full-round action that allows you to 이동 up to twice your 속도 and 공격 during the action. However, it carries tight restrictions on how you can 이동.

이동 During a 돌격: You must 이동 before your 공격, not after. You must 이동 at least 10 feet (2 squares) and may 이동 up to double your 속도 directly toward the designated opponent.

You must have a clear path toward the opponent, and nothing can hinder your 이동(such as difficult terrain or obstacles). Here의 what it means to have a clear path. First, you must 이동 to the closest space from which you can 공격 the opponent. (If this space is occupied or otherwise blocked, you can’t 돌격.) Second, if any line from your starting space to the ending space passes through a square that blocks 이동, slow 이동, or contains a creature (even an ally), you can’t 돌격. (Helpless creatures don’t stop a 돌격.)

If you don’t have line of sight to the opponent at the start of your turn, you can’t 돌격 that opponent.

You can’t take a 5-foot step in the same round as a 돌격.

If you are able to take only a standard action or a 이동 action on your turn, you can still 돌격, but you are only allowed to 이동 up to your 속도(instead of up to double your 속도). You can’t use this option unless you are restricted to taking only a standard action or 이동 action on your turn.

Attacking on a 돌격: After moving, you may make a single melee 공격. You get a +2 보너스 on 명중 굴림. and take a –2 페널티 to your AC until the start of your next turn.

A charging character gets a +2 보너스 on 근력 check made to 황소 쇄도 an opponent (see 황소 쇄도, above).

Even if you have extra 공격, such as from having a high enough 기본 공격 보너스 or from using multiple 무기, you only get to make one 공격 during a 돌격.

무장해제
